Text:
Question:
What is your top 3 of my previous compilation series besides Metal-Hard Rock Covers???
Interesting torrent, thanks. I was wondering, since when did Justin Bieber become metal-hard rock?

Hi mikeike65

He has never been, but someone has made a metal cover of his song!! ;-)

Hi Bio, answer to your question is NOT too easy.
I have followed your uploads for some time now and don't think I have any missing.
I look forward to them all, some of the themes are inspired. You have introduced me to so many artists and genres. I will think about it long and hard.
Many thanks for your continued offerings. Appreciated.
Be well
Many thanks Biomechanical, still going strong!

Thanks a lot man. I enjoy your collections for a while now...
My favorites are (in order):
Groove the Planet
Heavy Instrumentals
When Guitars meet violins...
besides metal hard-rock covers of course

Thanks a lot again for the job you've done til now...and thanks for making me discovering lots of great stuff

Hi Bio,
Thought long and hard, after the covers collection,
Hair Metal Never Dies
Heavy Instrumentals
Maidens Of Metal
In no particular order.
Many thanks & be well. T.

Here's my top three:

Hair Metal Never Dies
Let's Rock
Maidens Of Metal

Hi BIO!
My favorites are of course: Metal/Hard Rock Covers... but beyond that:

Metal Ballads
&
Maidens of Metal

-Thanks for all your work, and glad you HARD DRIVE issues are behind you now!
(heh)
